org.rdkit.knime.internals

Class ContextStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>
        • org.rdkit.knime.internals.ContextStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>, RDKitInternals<ContextStatistics>

    public class ContextStatistics
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>
implements RDKitInternals<ContextStatistics>
    This class implements RDKitInternals functionality like loading, saving and merging for the context statistics map which is required to generate meaningful warning messages.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • countItem

        public void countItem(java.lang.String context)
        Increases the statistics counter of the specified context by 1.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to be increase the counter for. Can be null to do nothing.

      • load

        public void load(Config settings)
        Description copied from interface: RDKitInternals
        Loads internal content from a KNIME setting object and restores the state of the internal object fully.
        Specified by:
        load in interface RDKitInternals<ContextStatistics>
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings to read internal content from. Can be null to do reset the internal content without restoring it.

      • save

        public void save(Config settings)
        Description copied from interface: RDKitInternals
        Saves the full state of internal content into a KNIME setting object. Calling RDKitInternals.load(Config) with the setting object will restore the full state.
        Specified by:
        save in interface RDKitInternals<ContextStatistics>
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings to store the internal content into. Can be null to do nothing.

      • merge

        public ContextStatistics merge(java.util.List<ContextStatistics> internals)
        Description copied from interface: RDKitInternals
        Merges multiple instances of an internals object together. It can be assumed that the passed in objects are all of exactly the same class. The instance on which merge is called will not be part of the merging process.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface RDKitInternals<ContextStatistics>
        Parameters:
        internals - Internals to be merged together. Can be null or empty to return null.
        Returns:
        The merged version of all passed in objects or the object itself, if nothing was passed in for merging.
